page.title: 09INDUSTRY OF PRESENT DAY
page.content: THE MONKLANDS, SITUATED AS IT IS IN THE HEART OF INDUSTRIAL SCOTLAND WITH GOOD ROAD (M8 AND M74 MOTORWAYS) AND RAIL ACCESS TO THE COUNTRY'S MAIN CONSUMER MARKETS, HAS ATTRACTED SOME OF THE{NEW LIGHTER INDUSTRY}NEEDED TO PROVIDE EMPLOYMENT FOR THOSE MADE REDUNDANT BY THE DECLINE OF THE TRADITIONAL HEAVY INDUSTRIES PARTICULARLY COAL. MOST OF THE NEW JOBS, HOWEVER, ARE IN THE TOWNS AND {WORKERS FROM THE RURAL EAST MONKLANDS {HAVE TO COMMUTE DAILY TO WORK}AND OFTEN EVEN FURTHER AFIELD. MONKLANDS DISTRICT RANKS AS A{SPECIAL {DEVELOPMENT AREA}AND SO ATTRACTS HIGH LEVELS OF GOVERNMENT ASSISTANCE. THE STIRLING ROAD INDUSTRIAL ESTATE WITH ADVANCE FACTORIES, EAST OF THE A73 (769670) WAS ALSO GRANT AIDED BY THE {EUROPEAN REGIONAL DEVELOPMENT FUND.}
